content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Enjoyed the Prime Boneless Short Ribs, Kimchi Stew w Pork Broth and Buckwheat Noodles in chilled beef broth. Food was great and the service was solid. It was our first time here and needed some extra menu explanation. Ambiance was good.
